verses.roman:
bāhire prabhura teṅho pāila daraśana
āste-vyaste āsi' kaila caraṇa vandana

synonyms: bāhire—outside the house; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; teṅho—he; pāila—got; daraśana—sight; āste-vyaste—with great haste; āsi'-coming there; kaila—did; caraṇa vandana—worshiping the lotus feet.
translation: The Bhaṭṭācārya noticed Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu outside, and with great haste he went to Him and offered prayers unto His lotus feet.
